sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card
    flat
    class="pa-3 mt-2"
  >
    <v-form class="multi-col-validation">
      <v-card-text class="pt-5">
        <v-row>
          <v-col cols="12">
            <v-text-field
              v-model="optionsLocal.name"
              outlined
              dense
              label="Name"
            ></v-text-field>
          </v-col>

          <v-col
            cols="12"
            md="6"
          >
            <v-text-field
              v-model="optionsLocal.tin"
              outlined
              dense
              label="Tin"
            ></v-text-field>
          </v-col>

          <v-col
            cols="12"
            md="6"
          >
            <v-text-field
              v-model="optionsLocal.contact_no"
              outlined
              dense
              label="Contact No."
            ></v-text-field>
          </v-col>

          <v-col
            cols="12"
            md="6"
          >
            <v-text-field
              v-model="optionsLocal.contact_person"
              outlined
              dense
              label="Contact Person"
            ></v-text-field>
          </v-col>

          <v-col
            cols="12"
            md="6"
          >
            <v-textarea
              v-model="optionsLocal.delivery_address"
              outlined
              rows="3"
              label="Delivery Address"
            ></v-textarea>
          </v-col>

          <v-col
            cols="12"
            md="6"
          >
            <v-text-field
              v-model="optionsLocal.email"
              outlined
              dense
              label="Email"
            ></v-text-field>
          </v-col>

          <v-col
            cols="12"
            md="6"
          >
            <v-textarea
              v-model="optionsLocal.terms"
              outlined
              rows="3"
              label="Terms"
            ></v-textarea>
          </v-col>

          <v-col
            cols="12"
            md="6"
          >
            <v-text-field
              v-model="optionsLocal.vat_rate"
              outlined
              dense
              label="Vat Rate"
            ></v-text-field>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
      </v-card-text>

      <v-card-text>
        <v-btn
          outlined
          class="mt-3"
          color="primary"
          type="reset"
          @click.prevent="goBack"
        >
          Back to List
        </v-btn>
      </v-card-text>
    </v-form>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
import { computed } from '@vue/composition-api'
import router from '@/router'

export default {
  props: {
    informationData: {
      type: Object,
      default: () => {},
    },
  },
  setup(props) {
    const optionsLocal = computed(() => props.informationData)

    const goBack = () => {
      router.push('/sales/clients')
    }

    return { optionsLocal, goBack }
  },
}
</script>
